titleStmt.title: Newes from Brussels, in a letter from a neer attendant on His Maiesties person. To a person of honour here. Which casually became thus publique.
titleStmt.author: Nedham, Marchamont, 1620-1678.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 23. 1659"; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
